org.actus.functions

Interface StateTransitionFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    STF_AD_PAM, STF_AD_SWPPV, STF_CD_FXOUT, STF_CD_LAM, STF_CD_PAM, STF_CD_STK, STF_CD_SWPPV, STF_DV_STK, STF_FP_LAM, STF_FP_PAM, STF_IED_LAM, STF_IED_PAM, STF_IED_SWPPV, STF_IP_CLM, STF_IP_PAM, STF_IP_SWPPV, STF_IPCB_LAM, STF_IPCI_LAM, STF_IPCI_PAM, STF_IPFix_SWPPV, STF_IPFloat_SWPPV, STF_PP_LAM, STF_PP_PAM, STF_PR_CSH, STF_PR_LAM, STF_PR_NAM, STF_PR_PAM, STF_PR_SWPPV, STF_PRD_LAM, STF_PRD_PAM, STF_PRD_STK, STF_PRD_SWPPV, STF_PY_LAM, STF_PY_PAM, STF_RR_ANN, STF_RR_LAM, STF_RR_PAM, STF_RR_SWPPV, STF_RRY_ANN, STF_RRY_LAM, STF_RRY_PAM, STF_SC_LAM, STF_SC_PAM, STF_STD_FXOUT, STF_STD1_FXOUT, STF_STD2_FXOUT, STF_TD_PAM, STF_TD_STK, STF_TD_SWPPV

    public interface StateTransitionFunction
    Component that updates the StateSpace for a specific ContractEvent

    This component implements the state-transiton function for a specific ContractEvent (and ContractType). Upon evaluation of a ContractEvent this component and PayOffFunction are evaluated through method lifecycle. Return value of this component's lifecycle function gives the post-event contract states for the respective ContractEvent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] eval(LocalDateTime time, StateSpace states, ContractModelProvider model, RiskFactorModelProvider riskFactorModel, DayCountCalculator dayCounter, BusinessDayAdjuster timeAdjuster)
      Evaluate the function

    • Method Detail

      • eval

        double[] eval(LocalDateTime time,
              StateSpace states,
              ContractModelProvider model,
              RiskFactorModelProvider riskFactorModel,
              DayCountCalculator dayCounter,
              BusinessDayAdjuster timeAdjuster)
        Evaluate the function
        Parameters:
        time - the schedule time of this particular event
        states - the current state of conract states
        model - the model containing parsed contract attributes
        riskFactorModel - an external market model
        dayCounter - the day count convention used to calculate day count fractions
        timeAdjuster - the business day convention used to shift the schedule time
        Returns:
        an array of post-event states of numerical contract states
